"Progeny of the Apocalypse":
"アークス各員に緊急連絡。
惑星ナベリウス上空に【深遠なる闇】と
【双子】が出現し、地表に向けて侵攻を
開始した。【双子】は【深遠なる闇】への
進路を阻むように存在し、連戦は確実だ。
侵攻を阻止し、敵性存在を殲滅せよ。
――――――――――――――――――――
Quest Clear Limit / Only once
Ranking Period / 1 Hour 30 Minutes From Start of Emergency
Failure: Fail objective, time limit expires"
"You'll be transported to the front soon. Your objective is to forge a path to the [Profound Darkness] by destroying Dark Falz [Double]."
"This enemy Dark Falz... we cannot even fathom the depths of its power. Be careful, and, please, come back to us safe and sound..."
"You've opened a path to the [Profound Darkness]. All that remains is for you to take down this powerful foe."
"We have no detailed orders or instructions for you. Fight bravely, and make it through this alive... That's an order. That is an order!"
